sentences.en: Even more usefully, you can copy files into the standard output and, then using pipes, you can extract the files from the standard input and copy the files from one location to another.
sentences.cn: 更有用的是，您可以将文件复制到标准输出，然后可以使用管道从标准输入中提取这些文件，并将它们从一个地方复制到另一个地方。

sentences.en: Extra money could be usefully spent on this project.
sentences.cn: 多余的钱可以有效地用在这个项目上.

sentences.en: I resolve to index data usefully.
sentences.cn: 我决心有效地索引数据。

sentences.en: In some cases the slag can be disposed of usefully.
In these books we are not only most agreeably entertained , but most usefully instructed.
sentences.cn: 这些书我们不但读起来津津有味, 而且还从中得到许多好处.

sentences.en: Make it provide base of vehicle hybrid power system control strategy usefully.
sentences.cn: 使之有效的为车辆多能源管理系统的控制策略的不断改进提供依据.

sentences.en: More usefully, you can combine it with other elements in order to support more complex output and filtering.
sentences.cn: 更有用的是，您可以将它与其他元素组合，以支持更复杂的输出和过滤。

sentences.en: Occasionally, there were observed specularite particles with their centers usefully converted.
sentences.cn: 偶尔可见颗粒中心部分未彻底转变完全的镜铁矿.

sentences.en: Overhead variances may be usefully considered as variable overhead variances and fixed overhead variances.
sentences.cn: 我们可以把管理费用分为可变费用和固定费用两种.

sentences.en: Then for about eight hours of each working day you will I hope, be usefully employed.
sentences.cn: 然后,每个工作日的另外八个小时里,你将从事有用的职业.

sentences.en: These offer usefully technologic parameter for widely spreading of technology of magnetic abrasive finishing.
sentences.cn: 进而为磁性研磨加工的推广应用获得了有实际参考价值的工艺参数.

sentences.en: We can usefully distinguish between four main kinds of international economic integration.
sentences.cn: 我们可以区分四种主要的国际经济一体化.

sentences.en: We might then usefully compare the operation of exception clauses to that of force majeure clauses.
sentences.cn: 然后,我们才可能有效地将免责条款的适用于不可抗力条款的使用作一番比较.

sentences.en: We need to find ways of dealing creatively and usefully with our feelings.
sentences.cn: 我们需要找到一些既有创意又实用的方法来调整我们的情绪。

sentences.en: With some simple properties, particles can usefully illustrate many laws of physics.
sentences.cn: 粒子具有简单的性质, 可用来阐明物理学的许多定律.

sentences.en: Within the same life - style, one can behave usefully or uselessly.
sentences.cn: 在同样的生活方式, 可以有益或无益的行为.
